name: Guarden [inDev]
description:
FAQ About Guarden

Those pesky bugs are back! Guarden is a tower defense game where you can micromanage unique towers and limited resources. You'll need to maintain, upgrade, and strategize your defenses to keep your beautiful flowers safe from those invading pests.

When is Guarden coming out?

Guarden is still in development. Be sure to follow our page to stay updated!

What platforms will Guarden be available on?

We're not sure yet, but once we'll cross that bridge when we get there!

Where can I go to see game updates?

You can follow our official Twitter page or AGuyLikeMatt(our lead developer) for sweet updates on Guarden and more!
